metadata.summary: Manage StrongDM infrastructure access and user permissions via CLI from LimaCharlie security workflows
metadata.primary_use_case: Automate privileged access management and infrastructure permission controls for security operations

extracted_apis.description: Returns a list of all users in the StrongDM Organization

cross_refs.description: Can integrate with Okta for identity federation and user authentication
Complementary tools for managing credentials and infrastructure access
